# mediaPlaybackAllowsAirPlay

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether Air Play is allowed from this view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var mediaPlaybackAllowsAirPlay: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value on both iPad and iPhone is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Managing media playback

- **allowsInlineMediaPlayback**: A Boolean value that determines whether HTML5 videos play inline or use the native full-screen controller.
- **mediaPlaybackRequiresUserAction**: A Boolean value that determines whether HTML5 videos can play automatically or require the user to start playing them.
- **allowsPictureInPictureMediaPlayback**: A Boolean value that determines whether Picture in Picture playback is allowed from this view.
